hooks.prompt: Check if .ralph/ directory exists in the project root and contains a feature folder. If yes: 1) Read the last 10 lines of .ralph/<feature>/progress.txt, 2) Show a reminder message: 'Ralph feature active: <name>. Last activity: <summary from progress>. Read .ralph/<feature>/claude.md for workflow process. Run /ralph-status to check progress or /ralph-continue to resume work.'
